post.summary: Add a new profile to a class

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: Class containing the profiles to return, only default-class is allowed

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the new profile

parameters.name: dryRun
parameters.description: If set to false the request will be executed, otherwise an equivalent TSO command will be returned

parameters.name: traceLevel
parameters.description: Trace level value passed to MXM

400.description: Bad input parameters, profile not provided

403.description: Non standard class is used, only default-class is allowed

example.message: Cross-Memory server failure (RC = 30, RSN = 0) - Server is not running

OR

Name queries not yet supported.

OR

get.summary: Get the log of the agent
get.description: Get the log of the agent

506.description: Set dataserviceAuthentication.rbac to true in server configuration

parameters.name: directory
parameters.description: the directory where file is located

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: the file that should be returned

parameters.name: responseType
parameters.description: the file should be returned in "base64" or "raw"

404.description: file could not be opened or does not exist

put.summary: writes contents to file or creates non-empty file
put.description: When writing to a Unix File, the process must be done in chunks of 3MB or less. Please note that your first request will fail because you haven't been assigned a sessionID. If you don't have a sessionID in your request, then the server will assign you one and send it as a response. Please attach this sessionID to every subsequent request as a query parameter. This sessionID is linked to a particular file, so you must use it for the duration of the upload. If you lose it, then the file will be inaccessible via this API until your session timesout in five minutes. When you have specified lastChunk as true, then that signals the end of the upload session; thus, you have sent all the contents of the file.

parameters.name: directory
parameters.description: the directory where the desired file is located

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: the file that should be modified

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the file contents encoded with BASE64

parameters.name: sessionID
parameters.description: the id for current upload session

parameters.name: sourceEncoding
parameters.description: the source encoding of the file (UTF-8 or ISO-8859-1 or IBM-1047)

parameters.name: targetEncoding
parameters.description: the target encoding of the file (UTF-8 or ISO-8859-1 or IBM-1047)

parameters.name: lastChunk
parameters.description: whether or not this is the last chunk of the file

parameters.name: forceOverwrite
parameters.description: whether or not to overwrite a currently existing file

SessionID.msg: Please attach the sessionID to subsequent requests

File Already Exists.msg: File already exists. Please choose a different file name or attach the forceOverwrite query parameter to your next request.

Encoding Missing.error: Source encoding or target encoding are missing.

Invalid Encoding.error: Unsupported encodings requested. Please review the swagger documentation.

Resource Busy (Duplicate).error: Duplicate in table. Requested resource is busy. Please try again later.

Resource Busy (Could not open file).error: Could not open file. Requested resource is busy. Please try again later.

Failure To Assign Session ID.error: Could not assign session id. Please try again later.

Failed To Write Chunk.error: Failed to write chunk to file. Aborting upload.

Failed to Get Metadata.error: Could not get metadata for file.

Failed to Get iNode.error: Could not get iNode of file.

Failed to Get deviceID.error: Could not get deviceID of file.

parameters.description: the directory where the desired file is located

parameters.description: the file that should be deleted
